memberdef.argsstring: (dmConnId_t connId, uint16_t offset, uint16_t len, uint8_t *pValue, attsAttr_t *pAttr, uint8_t operation)
memberdef.name: OtpsWriteName

briefdescription.para: Handle writing to the Object Name characteristic.

detaileddescription.para: This function handles write operations to the Object Name characteristic. It is called when a client writes to the Object Name attribute.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the value to write.
ATT operation (e.g., write with or without response).

simplesect.para: ATT status indicating the success or failure of the write operation.

memberdef.argsstring: (dmConnId_t connId, uint16_t offset, attsAttr_t *pAttr, uint8_t operation)
memberdef.name: OtpsReadName

briefdescription.para: Handle reading from the Object Name characteristic.

detaileddescription.para: This function handles read operations from the Object Name characteristic. It is called when a client reads the Object Name attribute.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to store the read value.
ATT operation (e.g., read request or read response).

simplesect.para: ATT status indicating the success or failure of the read operation.

memberdef.argsstring: (dmConnId_t connId, uint16_t offset, uint16_t len, attsAttr_t *pAttr, uint8_t *pValue, uint8_t operation, uint8_t filterId)
memberdef.name: OtpsWriteFilter

briefdescription.para: Handle setting a filter for the Object Server.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to store the read value.
ATT operation (e.g., read request or read response).
Filter Id to be updated, 1, 2 or 3

simplesect.para: ATT status indicating the success or failure of the read operation.

memberdef.argsstring: (dmConnId_t connId, uint16_t offset, attsAttr_t *pAttr, uint8_t operation, uint8_t filterId)
memberdef.name: OtpsReadFilter

briefdescription.para: Handle getting a filter from the Object Server.

parameterdescription.para: ATT operation (e.g., read request or read response).
Filter Id to be updated, 1, 2 or 3

simplesect.para: ATT status indicating the success or failure of the read operation.

memberdef.argsstring: (dmConnId_t connId, uint16_t offset, uint16_t len, uint8_t *pValue, attsAttr_t *pAttr, uint8_t operation, uint8_t attrType)
memberdef.name: OtpsWriteMetadata

briefdescription.para: Handle writing to Object Metadata characteristic.

detaileddescription.para: This function handles write operations to the Object Metadata characteristic. It is called when a client writes to the Object Metadata attribute.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the value to write.
ATT operation (e.g., write with or without response).
Type of attribute within Object Metadata (e.g., allocate size, current size).

simplesect.para: ATT status indicating the success or failure of the write operation.

memberdef.argsstring: (dmConnId_t connId, uint16_t offset, attsAttr_t *pAttr, uint8_t operation, uint8_t attrType)
memberdef.name: OtpsReadMetadata

briefdescription.para: Handle reading from the Object Metadata characteristic.

detaileddescription.para: This function handles read operations from the Object Metadata characteristic. It is called when a client reads the Object Metadata attribute.

connId
DM connection identifier.
offset
Read offset.
len
Read length.
pValue
Pointer to store the read value.
pAttr
Attribute to read.
operation
ATT operation (e.g., read request or read response).
attrType
Type of attribute within Object Metadata (e.g., allocate size, current size).
ATT status indicating the success or failure of the read operation.
Handle reading from the Object Metadata characteristic.

parameterdescription.para: Buffer to store the attribute value.

memberdef.argsstring: (dmConnId_t connId, uint16_t offset, uint16_t len, attsAttr_t *pAttr, uint8_t *pValue, uint8_t operation)
